data.name: UrlWhitespaceWarning
data.value: Warning: You have entered a URL that contains whitespace. If this is unintentional, the web API may not function as expected - whitespace is automatically URL encoded.

data.value: The Authorization URI cannot be empty

data.value: Web API: {0}

data.name: ErrorDuplicateParameter_Template

data.name: GuidanceDetailPanel
data.value: Enter a unique name and the Base URL of the Web API. The URL is used in all requests generated by the actions within this definition. The Base URL can contain Common Parameter values when specified in the format [parameter name].

data.name: GuidanceHttpHeaderPanel
data.value: Configure headers that are used in all actions for this API definition. The Header Value can contain Common Parameters values when specified in the format [parameter name].

data.name: GuidanceActionSpecificHttpHeaderPanel
data.value: Configure headers, specific to this action, that are used in addition to the common headers for this API definition. The value can contain common parameters and actions specific parameters when specified in the format [parameter name]. If a common header and action-specific header have the same name, the value of the action-specific header is used when the API is called.

data.name: GuidanceParametersPanel
data.value: Configure parameters available for all actions. Parameter values can be used dynamically in URL Paths, Header Values and request bodies when specified in the format [parameter name].

data.name: GuidanceActionSpecificParametersPanel
data.value: Configure parameters, specific to this action, that are available in addition to the common parameters for this definition. Parameter values can be used dynamically in URL paths, header values, and request bodies when specified in the format [parameter name]. Parameter names must be unique within the API definition.

data.name: GuidanceActionPanel
data.value: Complete the settings to define the action. Only enabled actions can be called from Objects and Processes. Values of Common Parameters and action-specific Parameters can be used dynamically in the URL Path and request Body when specified in the format [parameter name].

data.name: GuidanceActionSummary
data.value: Click Add Action to create and configure a new action for this API definition. The actions are available when the Web API Service is included in an Object or Process.

data.name: ErrorFailedToPopulateCredentialsList_Template
data.value: Failed to populate Credentials List: {0}

data.name: CommonAuthenticationsNode
data.value: Common Authentication

data.name: GuidanceBasicAuthenticationPanel
data.value: Use HTTP Basic Authentication to send the username and password from the selected credential in API requests. Select 'Expose to process' to make the credential available as an input for actions, listed under the entered Parameter Name.

data.name: GuidanceEmptyAuthenticationPanel
data.value: Select and configure an authentication type for the actions in this API definition.

data.name: ErrorEmptyAuthParameterName
data.value: Parameter Name must not be empty when Expose to Process is set to True

data.name: GuidanceBearerTokenAuthenticationPanel
data.value: Set up bearer token authentication where the bearer token has already been retreived and stored in a credential. Bearer tokens are most widely used with OAuth 2.0 authentication and JWT authentication.

data.name: GuidanceOAuth2AuthenticationPanel
data.value: This authentication type uses a client identifier and client secret stored in a credential to retrieve an OAuth 2.0 access token from an authorization server. The access token is then used to authenticate Web API requests.

data.name: GuidanceOAuth2WithJwtAuthenticationPanel
data.value: This authentication type generates a JWT Bearer Token that is used to retrieve an OAuth 2.0 access token from an authorization server. The access token is then used to authenticate Web API requests.

data.name: RequestNode
data.value: Request

data.name: ResponseNode
data.value: Response

data.name: GuidanceActionRequestPanel
data.value: Configure the request for this API definition by selecting a method and adding a URL path and request body.

data.name: GuidanceActionResponsePanel
data.value: Configure the response for the API action by creating additional custom output parameters. The output parameter values are derived from the HTTP response body, and each output parameter value can be generated either by defining a path to the value within a JSON response or by providing custom code to calculate the value.

data.name: ErrorEmptyParameter
data.value: Parameter name cannot be empty

data.name: ErrorInvalidPath
data.value: Path is not a valid JSON path

data.name: ErrorRootElementTokenMissingFromPath
data.value: Root element ($) missing from start of path.

data.name: EnterNewParameter
data.value: Enter new parameter

data.name: RemoveParameter
data.value: Remove parameter

data.name: ErrorInvalidDataType
data.value: Data type is invalid

data.name: ErrorValidatingWebApiCustomOutputParameters_Template
data.value: An error occurred while validating response output parameters: {0}

data.name: ErrorInvalidParameterName
data.value: Parameter name cannot contain a full-stop

data.name: GuidanceCustomAuthenticationPanel
data.value: This authentication type allows a custom authentication to be set up using the selected credential's properties as parameters when building the configured request. It is recommended to select a General credential for this authentication type. Username can be accessed using the syntax [Credential.Username], password using[Credential.Password] and any specified credential properties using [Credential.AdditionalProperties.<propertyName>].

data.name: ErrorValidatingWebApiCustomParameters_Template
data.value: An error occurred while validating parameters: {0}

data.name: ErrorActionNameCannotBeEmpty
data.value: Action name cannot be empty.

data.name: ErrorInvalidAuthenticationUrl_Template
data.value: The Authentication URL '{0}' is invalid: {1}

data.name: CommonCode_Unable_To_Populate_Field
data.value: Unable to populate field with selection - there is no active row. Please select a row by placing the cursor in it before browsing for an external resource.

data.name: GuidanceCommonCodePanel
data.value: Specify the language, settings and shared functionality used by custom code within this Web API

data.value: Request timeout values must be whole numbers between 1 and 100000.
